summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 1.7°C) and outside temperature (down 1.6°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 5%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.3 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in pressure (down 6 mbar), rainfall (up 0.3 mm), light levels (up 2997 lux), and cloud levels (up 440 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1374 m), rainfall (down 0.1 mm), and light levels (up 5348 lux) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s cloud levels is 440.3m lower than yesterday, 975.4m lower than past week, 1374.3m lower than past month.

The cloud levels yesterday fell between 860m minimum and 3110m maximum, with an average of 1433.1m; weekly and monthly averages were marginally higher at 2410m and 2810m.
cloud levels.summary: Expect mostly clear skies with high cloud.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; the temperature will feel nicely warm and pleasant. Also, very clammy and humid. Showers, mostly clear skies with high cloud, and moderate levels of sunlight will be present. Weather could become unsettled.
